website_summaries.verdict: A good number of runners agreed that the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 34 Shield was well-constructed and cushioned. They said that the traction it provided was perfect. Although one of the runners commented that the product was a bit small, others still recommended the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 34 Shield because of its reflectivity, fantastic design, and excellent performance. They loved wearing the shoe even on rainy days because of its breathability.
pros: Some of the testers agreed that the shoe was well-constructed
A lot of runners commented that the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 34 Shield provided excellent traction
One of the users said that the product was visible during evening runs
Many reviewers loved its attractive design
This running shoe kept the foot dry on rainy days, according to those who have tried it
A good number of buyers were impressed with the product's exceptional cushioning
cons: One user said that the sizing was a bit small when compared to the standard measurements
A consumer was disappointed because the color of the shoe was different in the pictures than from the actual

customer_reviews.title: Very very good running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Followed other review guidance and purchased a half size up (for swelling feet over long distances) and the sizing is perfect. All the compliments these shoes get are accurate. Toe box isn't too small, my Achilles isn't bothered by the back of the shoe. It's lightweight and slim, yet provides a nice amount of cushion. Only needed to run in them a couple times before I did a 10k and had no problems in the race. Hope Nike doesn't ever change this model, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: See Ess

customer_reviews.title: Not the color described
customer_reviews.text: I was leery after reading reviews about the color and they were right--Nike thinks black/black black-Obsidian is navy blue. They seem to run a little more snug than past models I bought retail (also mentioned in reviews). They're ugly but not uncomfortable so I kept them. Better with custom insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pat Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about these shoes but I don't hate them either. The ride is firmer and heavier than I expected; the laces aren't easily adjusted and I wish there were more reflective accents on the sides. They are comfortable enough for short runs (< 6 miles) and will get me through the winter but I will definitely go back to Saucony or Asics for my next shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not completely black (some navy), runs small
customer_reviews.text: There’s navy on the shoe! I wanted an all black shoe, and it is advertised as Black/Black/Obsidian. Unless Nike suddenly decided obsidian was not another word for Black, the colors are falsely advertised. Also, I’m normally a woman’s 7.5 but for Nike shoes I go up a half side; however, the 8 is a bit small for me. The shoe itself is fine. The regular Zoom Pegasus. Just be wary of the navy coloring and maybe go a half size up from your regular Nike size.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Love these💕
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool has blue stripes and underlay I thought they would be all black put was pleasantly surprised by the blue. Very stylish and I’ve gotten compliments on them already. They run like all Nikes a bit small so as expected for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. I have a wide foot and this doesn’t crush my foot or make them uncomfortable. These are great shoes for running or just lifting weights, love them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C

customer_reviews.title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, especially for someone with the foot issues my wife has. Provides the right support in the right places. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneakers after ordering up a size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up due to prior reviews. They are still a tad snug but liked them so much I bought a second pair. I’m on my feet all day long and have never had any discomfort with these sneakers. Love the color. Looks great with jeans and all my scrub colors!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie P

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are comfortable and amazing. They look great with jeans or sweatpants. Lastly, they are water resistant and can be worn in any weather.
customer_reviews.author: Aileena

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I under pronate and these keep my feet ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I under pronate and these keep my feet in proper alignment. My heels are narrow and Nike always fir me perfectly. I love the color. It’s black with navy accents so they will look good with black, navy or gray, which makes up most of my wardrobe. The swoosh blends in regather than contrasting and I like the understated look. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Karasik

customer_reviews.title: blue
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneakers but they are blue not black as described
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My feet roll out naturally, so I wish it felt more stable
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are super comfortable and look great too!! Highly recommend this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: MandySue

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very comfortable running shoe! Love how they looked and feel!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: this shoe is a great fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches, this shoe is a great fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: luvin_life

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe, very happy with the look and comfort ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe, very happy with the look and comfort although when they turned up one of the laces was neally cut in half from being done up in the knot maybe. Wouldn't be a big deal but these shoes won't look any good without the laces they come with so abit disappointed with that.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: 0/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: everything in the description says the shoe will be BLACK. i get my shoes and they’re NAVY BLUE. hardly black at all. very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love thes. The best support and cushion of Any ...
customer_reviews.text: Love thes. The best support and cushion of Any tennis shoe I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Holan
